body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Vincent Baker and the customer's name is Janice Watson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with XYZ Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking to get some information about your services.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! Can I also have your email address so I can send you more information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Now, could you please provide me with your phone number? Just the digits will do.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for that. I will make sure to send you the information shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Sarah! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John! Thank you for your time today. Have a wonderful day!
